summary: June 25 is the 176th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Iestyn Rhys Harris  is the Wales national rugby league team's coach. A former dual rugby code international player, he is also currently the head coach at Salford. Harris is a former Man of Steel winner and has also represented Wales on numerous occasions at both codes of rugby. He was named coach of the Wales national rugby league team toward the end of the 2009 season after finishing his playing career at Featherstone Rovers to move onto Crusaders as assistant.
title: Iestyn Harris
